item.title: Mod a SNES Gamepad
item.description:
Ever wanted to make a SNES gamepad wireless?

Like shown by XodusTech before, a wireless keyboard is used and taken apart to achieve this. The site helped me with understanding how to marry the gamepad with the keyboard’s 2.4 GHz transmitter, so you probably want to visit it, too.

I also have to say in advance that the project was not that easy: One doesn’t have much space in a SNES controller. :D

Read my project documentation

item.title: Hyde-X Tag Shortcode
item.description:
Want to use tags (categories) in your .md files when using the Hyde-X theme like this?

Then this line is for you:

<a class="label" href="{{ "/categories/" | absURL }}{{ .Get "txt" | urlize }}">{{ .Get "txt" }}</a>

Save in <root>/static/shortcodes/tag.html.

Use it like {{< tag txt="this" >}}.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hi and welcome! I created this page to provide an overview about my GitHub projects.

The sidebar shows the - yet unpopulated - categories (as of writing Make ‘n’ Mod and Scripts).

It will be filled with more content, soon. I am going to migrate some existing projects to GitHub.

item.title: About
item.description:
General

This GitHub page provides an overview of my projects.

It is a simple page with the aim to load fast (or fast enough to be still usable @GPRS speed when using your smartphone).

JavaScript

This page should work without enabled JavaScript. However, for eventual client-side syntax highlighting, it is recommended to turn it on.

Licenses and used projects

This static web page was built with Hugo in around 25ms.

Used projects (fully or partly):

  • Hyde theme: Project page w/ license - License copy
  • Hyde-X theme for Hugo: Project page w/ license - License copy
  • Highlight.js: Project page w/ license - License copy
  • Font Awesome by Dave Gandy: Project page

Thanks for these awesome projects.
